Name: Minor Enhancement
Description: Your weapon has been blessed, increasing the damage it deals. Gives 10 Click Damage.

Name: Minor Enrichment
Description: Your weapon has been blessed, inflicting poison on your enemies. Gives 5 Poison Damage.

Name: Minor Blessing of Deathblow
Description: Blessed by the priest, your strikes are now able to bring a more painful death on your enemies. Gives 10% Critical Click Damage.

Name: Blessing of the Desolation
Description: Your recent encounter in the Pyramid of Truth has left you feeling stronger, able to obliterate foes with much less effort. Gives 25% Aura Damage.

Name: Blessing of the Damned
Description: You have been infused by death itself, granting you the power you cause fatal damage to all foes around. Gives 50% Critical Click Damage.
